111310005.text: You want to say something? Just say it.

111310006.text: Do you wanna earn some money...
111310006.option: Do you wanna earn some money...

111310008.text: Why are you beating around the bush? This isn't like you, {NICKNAME}.

111310009.text: No need to beat around the bush. I will keep this a secret for you, if you wish.

111310010.text: I need a photo of you.
111310010.option: I need a photo of you.

111310012.text: I don't usually take photos, but March often sends me the pictures she snaps.

111310013.text: But... what exactly do you want my photo for?

120000002.text: March and I are doing missions for the Xianzhou...
120000002.option: March and I are doing missions for the Xianzhou...

120110000.text: Something happened just now. I just arrived at the Xianzhou. Are you alright?

120110001.text: What happened? Is the Express okay? What are you doing on the Xianzhou?

120110003.text: I'll pretend that you replied "I'm okay."

120110004.text: It's a long story. I'm at Cloudford with a Cloud Knight. I'll join you when I come out.

120110005.text: By the way, the Express is fine. I came here by myself. I'll tell you about it later.

120110006.text: I'm very interested. Tell me the details.

raid.name: Cloudford
raid.desc: Suddenly, your connection with Dan Heng is restored. After some simple pleasantries, you impatiently ask him about his adventure...

120110002.text: What are you doing on the Xianzhou? Is the Express okay? What happened?
120110002.option: What are you doing on the Xianzhou?

200040000.text: I might not go back to the Express today.

200040005.text: It would be tomorrow morning when I finish collecting everything I need for the data bank.

200040006.text: Why? Are you interested in it?

200040011.text: Furthermore, they're quite vigilant and difficult to observe. They'll scatter the moment they perceive any potential danger.

200040012.text: I'm thinking about choosing another location to observe them...

200040014.text: Using leaves to camouflage oneself? That might be a good idea.

200040016.text: Will I make it if I go there now?
200040016.option: Is it too late to come over now

200040018.text: Just wanna observe Dan Heng in a tree

200040023.text: Hiding within the flow of water? That might be a good idea.

200040025.text: Will I make it if I go there now?
200040025.option: Is it too late to come over now

200040027.text: Just wanna observe Dan Heng in the water

200040010.text: Don't worry. No need to push yourself.

200050000.text: {NICKNAME}, did you knock on the archives' door last night?

200050003.text: A noise came from the archives...

200050007.text: I was marking entries in the data bank when the electricity tripped and I accidentally kicked over a shelf.

200050008.text: By the time I came out, you'd already gone back to your room.

200050009.text: Thanks. Stop staying up so late

200050013.text: If you have time, check out the data bank. You said you wanted to understand Stellaron and Aeons better, so I've marked them up for you.

200050011.text: Thank you. As long as you're doing okay
200050011.option: As long as you're doing okay

200050006.text: A noise came from the archives...

200060000.text: Found an old Express communication log in the data bank, and one of the categories is Dad Jokes.

200060001.text: I don't fully understand it, but my instincts tell me you should be able to.

200060002.text: So, this is the kind of person I am in your mind?

200060007.text: "On watchkeeping duty with Himeko. She's talking in her sleep." Pom-Pom

200060008.text: There's another entry an hour later.

200060009.text: "On watchkeeping duty with Pom-Pom. They have been talking in their sleep for almost an hour." Himeko

200060012.text: Okay, looks like this categorization tag can stay for now.

200060015.text: The log stops there. I asked Himeko and Pom-Pom. Neither of them remembered the incident.

200060016.text: "Who is the one talking in their sleep?" Looks like we can only rely on other entries in the data bank to verify this information.

200060018.text: I tend to believe the data bank is omnipotent.
200060018.option: I tend to believe the data bank is omnipotent.

200060013.text: This is clearly a horror story
200060013.option: This is clearly a horror story

200060014.text: Is it? I didn't understand it, but sounds like we need an extra tag for it.

200060005.text: I don't think you've seen the log yet...

200910000.text: Having studied with Bailu, I now deeply feel the profound and fascinating pharmacology behind the use of medicinal herbs.

200910001.option: Is this emergency medicine as well?

200910002.text: Seems like she gave Pom-Pom some before

200910004.text: Emergency medicine can be ingested directly. They are very convenient.

200910007.text: She mentioned her philosophy regarding there being "a special cure for each person." If I can master her teachings, I think I might be able to create medication suited to everyone on the Express.

200910008.text: Speaking of which, the fact that I don't know any cloudhymn magic that can heal is... saddening.

200910009.text: Maybe you should consult the Omni-Synthesizer?

200910010.text: Perhaps asking Bailu will make things faster.

200910015.text: Though the power of the high elder is rooted in legacy, to me, it is more like a certain type of "knowledge" rather than "memories."

200910016.text: The stories that I can see... They have existed long before I was even self-aware.

200910017.text: If it's like "knowledge," then maybe it's up to you on how to use them

200910019.text: I hope I made the right choice.

200910023.text: I want to know everything too
200910023.option: I want to know everything too

200910024.text: The sensation is a miserable one. Your mind is filled with uncountable scenes and noises, but you are never present.

200910025.text: I can't completely understand what you're feeling, but is it kinda like the Voice of the Stellaron?
200910025.option: Like the Voice of the Stellaron?

200910026.text: It takes some time to get used to

200910028.text: Perhaps one day I will be able to co-exist with it, just like you do with yours.

200910011.text: By the Aeons, Dan Heng's not all-capable...

200910012.text: I still have much to learn.

200910013.text: You don't remember anything at all?
200910013.option: You don't remember anything at all?

200910014.text: I do not possess such power.

200910006.text: ...There might be. I will have to research this when I have time.

200920003.text: I dreamed that I destroyed the world

200920006.text: I've had such dreams as well.

200920007.text: I wish those scenes would only remain in my dreams, but some things... I'm not sure whether they had really happened...

200920008.text: Do you have these same worries when you have nightmares?

200920009.text: You know, until you asked that question, I didn't consider the possibility...
200920009.option: No, and I don't really care

200920012.text: That is a response only you could give.

200920013.text: That's what trailblazing taught me. Didn't expect that, did you?

200920035.text: No matter what happens, we're on the Express now. Just relax!

200920015.text: This is what you taught me. Didn't expect that, did you?

200920016.text: No... I don't remember ever giving you such instruction.

200920017.text: I'm just like that. C'mon, it's not as if we just met
200920017.option: That's just the way I am

200920010.text: Yeah, but I don't have any evidence to prove that such things ever happened...
200920010.option: Yeah, but I can't prove it

200920011.text: I don't know... But I can't remember anything, so just treat it as if it never happened...
200920011.option: If you can't remember, then it didn't happen.

200920004.text: I dreamed that I lost my companions

200920005.text: I dreamed that I wasn't myself

200920022.text: Sometimes, I dream of destroying the world. Other times, I dream of losing my companions. Sometimes, I even dream that I'm not myself.

200920023.text: I wish those scenes would only remain in my dreams, but some things... I'm not sure whether they had really happened...

200920024.text: If it were you, would you have such worries?

200920025.text: I probably won't care about this stuff. What happened in the past has nothing to do with the person I am right now...
200920025.option: I don't really care about these things

200920028.text: That is a response only you could give.

200920029.text: That's what trailblazing taught me. Didn't expect that, did you?

200920031.text: This is what you taught me. Didn't expect that, did you?

200920032.text: No... I don't remember ever giving you such instruction.

200920033.text: I'm just like that. C'mon, it's not as if we just met
200920033.option: That's just the way I am

200920026.text: Whether I worry has nothing to do with whether these things actually happened...

200920027.text: I don't remember anything now, so I just treat it as if it never happened...
200920027.option: If you can't remember, then it didn't happen.

200930000.text: {NICKNAME}. I'm going to the Luofu. Just letting you know.

200930007.text: So, the reason you're going is...?
200930007.option: So, the reason you're going is...

200930008.text: Though the data bank also has a section on the Luofu, I don't understand the details very well.

200930009.text: Likewise, I was unable to answer any questions Pom-Pom has regarding the various dishes on the Xianzhou.

200930010.text: If time allows, I wish to see things for myself in person.

200930011.text: {NICKNAME}, how do you find food on the Xianzhou?

200930014.text: I strongly recommend mung bean soda.

200930015.text: I guessed it'd be mung bean soda.

200930023.text: Some simple analyses would suffice to reach this conclusion.

200930024.text: I'll get one for you too

200930045.text: There's also a type of yogurt that looked very interesting. A pity it sold out for now.

200930046.text: Its name is: Puffergoat Belly Bliss

200930047.text: Let's come back and check again later.

200930017.text: I guessed it'd be steamed puffergoat milk.

200930019.text: I guessed it'd be Immortal's Delight.

200930027.text: Really? I don't really feel that

200930030.text: Though I don't think you'll like it.

200930031.text: If I had to choose something I like...
200930031.option: If I had to choose a favorite...

200930032.text: Then I'll choose mung bean soda.

200930033.text: I expected you would want that.

200930041.text: Some simple analyses would suffice to reach this conclusion.

200930042.text: I'll get one for you too

200930035.text: I expected you would want that.

200930037.text: I expected you would want that.

200930005.text: You gotta repeat the important stuff twice

121170000.text: Our starskiff went off course. How's the situation on your end?

121170003.text: Yes. How's the situation on your end?

121170004.text: We caught Kafka, but it was too easy. It was kinda odd

121170006.text: What about Kafka's companion? Did you see Blade?

121170007.text: Kafka was alone when we caught her. What's the matter?

121170009.text: Be careful. He is very dangerous.

121170010.text: I'll shake off the Cloud Knights and catch up to you.

121170012.text: Wait. What's going on at your end?
121170012.option: What's going on at your end?

raid.name: Artisanship Commission
raid.desc: Dan Heng once again got in touch with you after intermittently losing contact. What kind of adventures did he encounter this time?

121170008.text: He ran away. Dunno where he is
121170008.option: That man is out there somewhere

121170005.text: We caught Kafka and went to the Divination Commission
121170005.option: We went to the Divination Commission

121410002.text: I would like to ask you to accompany me on a certain task...

121410004.text: I want to meet the current high elder of the Luofu Vidyadhara.

121410007.text: I want to ask about some bygone matters, so that I will better understand what I can still do to make amends for my past life.

121410008.text: Okay. I'll be there any time you need me

121410009.text: Thank you. Let us meet at Synwood Pavilion in Exalting Sanctum.

121410010.text: This feels like a really formal occasion. Do I have to be there?
121410010.option: Do I have to be there?

121410011.text: I fear complications will arise if I go alone.

121410012.text: But with you present, things are different. I heard you helped save that Dragon Lady. It will make things much easier to handle.

121410013.text: I will wait for you at Synwood Pavilion in Exalting Sanctum. See you there.

121410005.text: So you're worried that someone on the Xianzhou might want to hurt you, and want me as your bodyguard?

121410006.text: You jest. I want to meet the current high elder of the Luofu Vidyadhara.

info.name: Dan Heng
info.signature: For anything related to the data bank, come find me.
